content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with A Case For Dr. Morelle this week. We’ll hear his story from May 14, 1957, The Sleepwalker.

(30:32) Calling All Cars is up second with, The Baby Dillinger Gang. This episode originally aired November 26, 1936.

Download CaseClosed695

Case Closed is made available for free thanks to your support. If you’re able to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
